name: Color Spin - Music
description:
Love music, simple and challenging games? Then Color Spin is the game for you.

Simply tap when the spinning pointer color matches the sector colors. Easy? You wish! Be careful not to pass through the wrong color, or you will have to start again! The more you progress, the more sequential matches you need to make.

How fast are you? Can you beat your friend's score?

Game features:

- Beautiful background music with various songs for you to choose from.
- Fantastic theme.
- Multiple levels of increasing difficulty to show your skills.
